sentences.sentence: The value of China decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2014; while India and Dutch decrease greatly between 2010 and 2014.

sentences.sentence: The value of China decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2014; while India and Dutch decrease greatly between 2010 and 2014.
